node.doctext:
Perhaps a better title for this node would be "Nodes Without Valid Authors. The following nodes have a author set, but that user no longer exists in the database.

Clicking on some of the links will take you to a "Nothing Found" page, but all nodes listed below have a record in the node table.

[% my $queryText = "SELECT node_id,title,type_nodetype,author_user FROM node WHERE author_user NOT IN (SELECT node_id FROM node) ORDER BY type_nodetype,title"; my $list = $DB->{dbh}->prepare($queryText); $list->execute() or return $list->errstr; my $n; my $dbrow; my $t; my $lnk; my $str = ""; while($dbrow = $list->fetchrow_arrayref) { $t = getNodeById($$dbrow[2]); $str .= ''; } $str .= "
node_id title type author_user
'.$$dbrow[0].' '.$$dbrow[1].' (basicedit) '.$$t{title}.' '.$$dbrow[3].'
"; return $str; %]
node.title: Nodes Without Authors
